feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING IN EFFECT, La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:42 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
